levels.description:
Passive Effect: Whenever a Servant of Lamentation is created or upgraded, all surrounding enemies take <@ba.vup>{atk_scale:0%}</> of Necrass's ATK as Arts damage
Active Effect: Resummons all Servants of Lamentation immediately; if there are none on the field, summons 1
